com.example.anna.colorgame

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.example.anna.colorgame.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeathmatchGame, DuelGame, PuzzleGame, TrafficGame

    public class Game
extends AppCompatActivity
    This class is a super class for every game in this application. It is created to store variables and methods shared by all game classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateMusic()
      This method instantiates MediaPlayer instances with specified values.
      void closeThread()
      This method is used to close the thread.
      void giveUp(View view)
      This method is called when button "Give Up" is clicked.
      void onBackPressed()
      This method is called when user navigates using Back button on the screen.
      void onClick(View view)
      This method is called when one of the buttons is clicked in the GUI.
      void sendDataToServer(java.lang.String color, java.lang.String data)
      This method is used to create new instance of a ConnectToServer class and send data as parameter to doInBackground method of that class.
      void setPlayer(Player player)
      This method is used to initiate a player instance with specified value.
      void showAlertDialog(Context context)
      This method is used to show AlertDialog in game activity.
      void startThread()
      This method is used to start a thread that listens for incoming data from server.

      • Game

        public Game()

    • Method Detail

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(Player player)
        This method is used to initiate a player instance with specified value.
        Parameters:
        player - Player

      • activateMusic

        public void activateMusic()
        This method instantiates MediaPlayer instances with specified values.

      • onClick

        public void onClick(View view)
        This method is called when one of the buttons is clicked in the GUI. Which button is pushed is stored in data variable. Then the semicolon and userID is added to data string and sent to sendDataToServer method.
        Parameters:
        view - View

      • sendDataToServer

        public void sendDataToServer(java.lang.String color,
                             java.lang.String data)
        This method is used to create new instance of a ConnectToServer class and send data as parameter to doInBackground method of that class.
        Parameters:
        color - String
        data - String

      • startThread

        public void startThread()
        This method is used to start a thread that listens for incoming data from server.

      • closeThread

        public void closeThread()
        This method is used to close the thread. It stops while loop and interrupts the thread.

      • showAlertDialog

        public void showAlertDialog(Context context)
        This method is used to show AlertDialog in game activity. It is called when GiveUp button is pushed.

      • giveUp

        public void giveUp(View view)
        This method is called when button "Give Up" is clicked.
        Parameters:
        view - View

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        This method is called when user navigates using Back button on the screen. AlertDialog is shown by calling showAlertDialog() method.
